trait_agrarian.potential_crossbreeding_chance: 1.0	# 1.0 = 100% chance of being considered for new traits when forming half-species. does not guarantee the trait will be added if it costs points.

allowed_archetypes.custom_tooltip_with_modifiers: void_dweller_trait_tooltip #unlike custom_tooltip, this shows in addition to the modifiers
